edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.SessionManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockSessionManager

    public class SessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages Sessions for the ManagerLayer. Wraps a Map of Sessions and provides interaction and manipulation functionality
    Author:
    twack

        public java.lang.String generateUniqueSessionId()

      • switchToProject

        public java.lang.String switchToProject(java.lang.String sessionId,
                               java.lang.String projectName)
                                 throws WPISuiteException
        Renews the Session for a given sessionToken. Parses the username from the token, then creates a new session for the given user.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the session being switched.
        projectName - the name of the project being switched to.
        Returns:
        the new Session ID
        Throws:
        WPISuiteException
